remarks: Membership in a set of open intervals of extended reals.  We use the fact that an operation's value is empty outside of its domain to show ` A e. RR* ` and ` B e. RR* ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
statement:
ixx.1 $e |- O = ( x e. RR* , y e. RR* |-> { z e. RR* | ( x R z /\ z S y ) } ) $.
elixx3g $p |- ( C e. ( A O B ) <-> ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ C e. RR* ) /\ ( A R C /\ C S B ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
